originalText.text:
Finding a reliable dentist can be a challenge. I hope your search ends with Dental Passion. This exceptional dental office offers unparalleled customer service, with a dedicated staff that prioritizes the well-being of every patient. From the moment you walk in the receptionists are warm,  welcoming, and greet you by name. The team goes above and beyond to accommodate your scheduling needs, making appointment-setting hassle-free.
Dr. Tu, is an exceptional professional dentist. His friendly demeanor and professionalism create a comfortable environment, while his commitment to providing honest opinions ensures your satisfaction with the dental services received. Trust Dental Passion for an outstanding dental experience tailored to your needs.

originalText.text: I have visited office for my emergency filling fell off situation for making appointment. Fortunately, Dr. Schik was present and kindly offered me to help check my tooth immediately. After careful Xray and diagnosis of my condition, he referred to me another specialist for further treatment and took care of giving me a temporary filling to my cracked tooth. I was feel relieved and very happy to be taken care of my situation well with Dr Schik today.

originalText.text: It was easy to schedule an appointment. upon arrival I waited less than 10min. The dental assistant immediately took x-rays. The doctor came in and quickly started cleaning my teeth. I am super sensitive so he applied a numbing gel to my gums, which I thought was great. My cleaning was quick, thorough and completely pain free. I have been going to Dental Passion for many years and will continue.

originalText.text: Dr. Lee is very friendly and knowledgeable! The office was also able to see me for an emergency last minute appointment on a Saturday. Highly recommend this office!

text.text: Dr. Lee is very friendly and knowledgeable! The office was also able to see me for an emergency last minute appointment on a Saturday. Highly recommend this office!

originalText.text: I started going to Dental Passion last year and it's been a wonderful experience.  My dentist, Dr. Groglio, did my cleaning herself, she explained the work I need to have done in detail, and she referred me to an oral surgeon who was amazing.
